title: Delamain SIG CIGAR XO at Club Mareva Beirut

content.raw:
The fabled alchemy between fine Cognac and hand rolled cigars has been celebrated for over three centuries a ritual of refinement, patience, and pleasure. Today, Club Mareva Beirut proudly continues this legacy as one of only three venues in the world to offer the Delamain SIG CIGAR XO, a remarkable collaboration between Delamain Cognac and Aaron “Sig” Sigmond, the acclaimed American author and longtime friend of ours.

A Collaboration Born from Passion and Friendship

Only 96 bottles of this extraordinary Cognac exist worldwide, and Club Mareva Beirut has been entrusted with just 18 a privilege that reflects our enduring connection with both the Maison Delamain and Aaron Sigmond. Aaron’s name is well known to cigar aficionados through his celebrated works Cigars: A Biography and The Impossible Collection of Cigars. It was our honor myself, Woody, and my wife Najat to have collaborated with Aaron on Cigars: A Biography, a project that deepened our friendship and shared devotion to the cigar world. That friendship now continues in liquid form through Delamain SIG CIGAR XO, an eau de vie born from Aaron’s partnership with Charles Braastad, ninth generation descendant of James Delamain and current maître de chai of the famed Cognac house. Together, they created a Cognac that doesn’t merely pair with cigars it was designed for them.

A Masterful Blend of Tradition and Elegance

Crafted exclusively from Grande Champagne, the premier cru of Cognac, Delamain SIG CIGAR XO reveals a profound dialogue between richness and restraint a conversation much like the one between Cognac and cigar, and between the creators themselves. Aromas: rounded and complex, with orange zest, vanilla “rancio,” and the subtle earthiness of vine shoots. Palate: raisins and candied fruits unfold with satiny smoothness, balanced by delicate oak and an enduring warmth that complements both Cuban and New World puros. Style: elegant yet powerful, mature yet fresh a Cognac that never loses its voice, even alongside the boldest cigars.

Now Available at Club Mareva Beirut

As one of only three destinations worldwide to host this release alongside Arturo Fuente Cigar Club in Santo Domingo and The Carnegie Club in New York Club Mareva Beirut proudly stands among this select trio, inviting connoisseurs to experience and acquire this limited edition in the intimate setting of our lounge. Delamain SIG CIGAR XO is now available exclusively at Club Mareva Beirut for $250 per bottle. It is more than a Cognac; it is a celebration of craftsmanship, friendship, and the shared pursuit of excellence that unites Maison Delamain, Aaron Sigmond, and Club Mareva Beirut. A toast to heritage, to artistry, and to the timeless bond between Cognac and cigars.
